Description: Papyrus fragment bearing 6 lines of a Coptic text written along the fibres (recto) and 4 lines against the fibres (verso). EA 75356, 75357, 75358, 75359, 75360, 75361, 75362 are mounted together.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (380742) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/380742)
